textAfterTable: Placed on waivers by the Toronto Maple Leafs. 7/10/2013 Signed as an unrestricted free agent by the Toronto Maple Leafs to a one-year contract. 4/10/2013 Loaned to Portland (AHL). 1/18/2013 Assigned to Norfolk (AHL). 1/16/2013 Re-signed as an unrestricted free agent by the Anaheim Ducks to a one-year contract. 2012 9/21/2012 Signed by the Norfolk Admirals (AHL). 2011 10/12/2011 Signed as a free agent by the Anaheim Ducks to a one-year two-way contract. 10/05/2011 Released from training camp by the Winnipeg Jets. 9/13/2011 Invited to training camp by the Winnipeg Jets. 6/28/2011 Carolina Hurricanes did not tender a qualifying offer. 2010 11/16/2010 Claimed off waivers from the Anaheim Ducks. 2009 12/28/2009 Recalled from Toronto (AHL). 11/18/2009 Re-assigned to Toronto (AHL). 9/27/2009 Assigned to San Antonio (AHL). 6/30/2009 Signed by the Anaheim Ducks to a two-year contract extension. 4/05/2009 Recalled from Iowa (AHL). 3/12/2009 Assigned to Iowa (AHL). 3/04/2009 Recalled from Iowa (AHL). 1/22/2009 Assigned
